entry.title: Freekeh is my favourite grain and I would love to see more people eating it! - It’s really high in protein and fibre. One small serving (half cup) of cooked freekeh has about 8 grams of protein. - It also contains zinc, iron, copper, potassium, calcium,

entry.title: If you’ve never tried the combination of tahini with date syrup, let me tell you that it’s the most decadent, indulgent caramel-y drizzle that ever existed. Creamy, nutty and perfectly balanced sweetness. So of course it was insanely good on an affogato!
entry.content: If you’ve never tried the combination of tahini with date syrup, let me tell you that it’s the most decadent, indulgent caramel-y drizzle that ever existed. Creamy, nutty and perfectly balanced sweetness. So of course it was insanely good on an affogato!
